column4: my laptop screen is 1440x900 ... so I went into etc/X11/xorg.conf and made the addition, but after restarting X it is still 1024x768, and that is the highest option offered by the screen resolution menu.  I changed it in Breezy ... what am I missing here?
jsut a note you restarted X right after you made the change
backup your xorg.conf file then sudo  dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
